name: astronote-monorepo
description: Enterprise-grade SMS Marketing Platform for Shopify and Retail Businesses
author: Konstantinos Pechlivanidis

scripts.dev: concurrently -n shopify-api,astronote-web -c blue,green "npm run dev:shopify" "npm run dev:web"
scripts.build: npm -w @astronote/web-next run build && npm -w @astronote/retail-api run build && npm -w @astronote/shopify-api run build
scripts.lint: npm -w @astronote/web-next run lint --if-present && npm -w @astronote/shopify-api run lint --if-present
scripts.lint:fix: npm -w @astronote/web-next run lint:fix --if-present && npm -w @astronote/shopify-api run lint:fix --if-present
scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run format && npm run build
